T02D2010:219a-0: @219a // na mo badzra bhee ra b'a ya /
T02D2010:219a-1: stong nyid las byung nam mkha'i dbyings na bzhugs //
T02D2010:219a-2: 'jam dpal thugs rje khros pa'i rdo rje 'jigs byed ni //
T02D2010:219a-3: dur khrod brgyad kyis bskor zhing gar dgu'i nyams dang ldan //
T02D2010:219b-0: khro rgyal dus mtha'i me ltar 'bar la @219b phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D2010:219b-1: zhal dgu phyag ni sum cu rtsa bzhi zhabs bcu
T02D2010:219b-2: drug / mthing nag mi'u thung gzugs can gcer bu
T02D2010:219b-3: ma he'i zhal // phem dang ha ha hi hi drag po'i sgra dang ldan //
T02D2010:219b-4: mi 'gyur 'jam dpal bde chan khyod la phyag 'tshal bstod //
T02D2010:219b-5: drag po'i stobs kyis bdud bzhi 'joms mdzad gshin rje'i gshed //
T02D2010:219b-6: grub chen brgyad kyi dbugs 'byin skye mched mchog sbyin mdzes //
T02D2010:219b-7: sems can re skong las mdzad byams pa thugs rje can //
